resources.string: This is my Bimbi Coffee Shop, Meoww! Try scrolling :)
Phone: +36 1 864512X or 6 or 9 or can"'t remember
Opening hours: 0-24 Mon-Sun, when I"'m not bathing in the Sun light.
Description: Come and you"'ll see all the cat things we do with coffee.
My pictures are definitely not copyrighted. Except the background which is from jozara.com :)
